recipe.ingredients: - chickpeas (rinsed and drained): 1 can (15 ounces) - cucumber (diced): 1 medium - cherry tomatoes (halved): 1 cup - red onion (finely chopped): 1/4 cup - Kalamata olives (pitted and sliced): 1/4 cup - feta cheese (crumbled): 1/2 cup - olive oil: 2 tablespoons - lemon juice: 2 tablespoons - garlic (minced): 1 clove - dried oregano: 1 teaspoon - salt: 1/4 teaspoon - black pepper: 1/8 teaspoon
recipe.directions: 1. Prepare Vegetables: Dice the cucumber, halve the cherry tomatoes, finely chop the red onion, and slice the Kalamata olives. 2. Mix Ingredients: In a large bowl, combine chickpeas, cucumber, cherry tomatoes, red onion, Kalamata olives, and crumbled feta cheese. 3. Make Dressing: In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, lemon juice, minced garlic, dried oregano, salt, and black pepper. 4. Combine and Chill: Pour the dressing over the salad and toss to coat evenly. Refrigerate for at least 20 minutes to allow flavors to meld. 5. Serve: Enjoy the refreshing and savory Mediterranean chickpea salad as a fulfilling lunch.
recipe.nutrition: Total Carbohydrate: 45g, Dietary Fiber: 12g, Sodium: 580mg, Saturated Fat: 3g, Total Fat: 17g, Protein: 13g, Added Sugars: 0g, Total Sugars: 5g, Cholesterol: 15mg
recipe.total_calories_estimation: - Total Calories for entire recipe : Approximately 785 calories for the entire recipe. - Calories for each ingredient: Chickpeas: 364 calories per can Cucumber: 16 calories Cherry Tomatoes: 27 calories Red Onion: 15 calories Kalamata Olives: 40 calories Feta Cheese: 198 calories Olive Oil: 119 calories per 2 tablespoons Lemon Juice: 4 calories Garlic: 2 calories Oregano, Salt, Black Pepper: Negligible - Serving People: 4
